Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Jermaine Rodgers
Reviews.Content: LOVE THIS PHONE ITS EVERYTHING I NEEDED IN A DEVICE AND I PAID A REASONABLE PRICE FOR IT I AM HAPPY

Reviews.Title: Great 100% functional
Reviews.Author: Kenya
Reviews.Content: Only had it for a week or so and it works great. i upgraded from the lg ally and this is wayyy better. Fast shipping and everything in the description was included.

Reviews.Title: HTC Droid
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Glenn
Reviews.Content: My son has one so I checked this one it is great I never want any other style going to stay with this one.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: achanti10
Reviews.Content: I love the phone works great I just brought one for my wife so I hope she will like it as much as I did

Reviews.Title: htc
Reviews.Author: ricnlori
Reviews.Content: This phone is great. First time I have ordered a phone through this person and the experience was flawless. If I need anything else I would use this person again!

Reviews.Title: incredible
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Csepel
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, it is everything a smart phone should be. I would recommend this to anybody looking for a great deal.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: larrell smith
Reviews.Content: this is my first verizon wireless smart phone from verizon i must say it's great being that it's a much older device it runs very smooth and fast the 3g speeds are very nice i'm very happy with this product however where i'm at there are trees that pretty much crashed the signal it's off and on but it's not terrible much better than my sprint htc evo v 4g from virgin mobile

Reviews.Title: daughter loved phone
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Cintora
Reviews.Content: "daughter loves new phone, but item didn't come with any information and when tried to activate it, it was activated with a phone number, had to try 3 times to activate it."

Reviews.Title: This phone is a pile!!
Reviews.Author: Jared L.
Reviews.Content: Battery Life very low, not as user friendly as it should be, and slow.  Don't waste the money. Within thirty days it died on me as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Service and product
Reviews.Author: Alvin C.
Reviews.Content: The Phone was a gift for my wife and she loves it better than her Nokia lumnia the service was great even during the holidays I received it in a very timely manner.

Reviews.Author: Krystina
Reviews.Content: Said no contract phone didn't realize that ment u had to start a contract to make it work..cant even post

Reviews.Title: It was fine
Reviews.Author: Chela
Reviews.Content: Phone was fine. It was how it was described. Don't know what more to ssy about expect that it was fine

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Ricki Schneider
Reviews.Content: I got this phone to replace my iphone that was damaged.  I'm not a big android fan.  I realize this phone is 3 years out of date.  All reviews I saw were from 2010.  Certain apps don't load properly.  I had to buy a sd card to download music and certain other apps.  Just yesterday, my phone reset itself and I lost all my pictures.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: debbieb brozovich
Reviews.Content: I thought I was getting a better phone  with more options and it did not. it has less... I wish I just spent the money and got another phone G 4 that I broke.

Reviews.Title: Cool Phone
Reviews.Author: Saivamsi
Reviews.Content: I really liked, easy to use and great speakers. I loved the camera, but only problem is that it is old.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Denise Giese
Reviews.Content: the product was fine. i am not sure  that i am happy with the style of the phone, but it is ok.

Reviews.Title: nice droids
Reviews.Author: William E Witham
Reviews.Content: bought these as a replacement for 2 stolen phones.couldnt be any happier. they came quick and were well worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: hate this phone
Reviews.Author: James Wade Hollon
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because less than a year this phone quit working. I would not recommend this product to any one.

Reviews.Title: Phone worked long enough to enter a few contacts then Quit.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Warner
Reviews.Content: This phone worked long enough to enter a few contacts then shut down.  I tried to turn it back on and it just keeps rebooting to the HTC Incredible screen and then shuts down again.  Customer service for HTC said to try to put it in safe mode...well good luck...can't even get that to work.

Reviews.Title: Raggedy
Reviews.Author: JENNIFER SWOOPE
Reviews.Content: This by far is the worst phone I've ever had. The screen freezes and won't come back on unless I plug the charger into it. I have been in an emergency situation and could not dial out!! HTC is a waste of technology!

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: alexis
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping very helpful and good Outlook!!! I personally didn't like the phone but it was really good while I had it

Reviews.Title: Ugh
Reviews.Author: Brittany hindbaugh
Reviews.Content: It had problems with it it would freeze and shut off by its self. I wish I didn't  even get it.
